term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spin-allowed electronic transition
term.title: spin-allowed electronic transition

item.text: An electronic transition which does not involve a change in the spin part of the wavefunction.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2276 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
